ComicInfo.Penciller: Chuck Jones,Richard Horie,Eric Stephenson,Richard Horie,Eric Stephenson,Chuck Jones
ComicInfo.Summary:
Changing Of The Guard: After the humiliating defeat at the hands of Supreme, Chapel is commissioned to lead the undead team. Cabbot and the rest of the team are not too thrilled about the command change and Chapel and Cabbot end up coming to blows. Also, big changes take place in Project: Born Again thanks to being infiltrated by the Covenant of the Sword.
A Story of The Knight - Chapter 5: How Davros became the enemy of The Knight is explained.
ComicInfo.Title: Changing Of The Guard; A Story of The Knight - Chapter 5
ComicInfo.Writer: Keith Giffen,Rob Liefeld,Eric Stephenson,Eric Stephenson,Keith Giffen,Rob Liefeld
